decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The proposed single-storey side and rear infill extension, by way of the excessive projection and inclusion of a wrap-around section, would remove the original staggered shape of the house at the rear and would result in a bulky addition to the property, which would not relate well to the site or the character of the Strand on the Green Conservation Area and would not complement the original building or harmonise with adjoining properties, contrary to policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development), ENV-B.2.2 (Conservation Areas) and H.6.4 (Extensions and Alterations) of the adopted Unitary Development Plan as well as the Residential Extension Guidelines adopted 2003.

Condition : 2 - 2.	The proposed single-storey infill extension, by way of the excessive projection and inclusion of a wrap-around section, would result in an unreasonable loss of outlook for the property to the west; contrary to policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development) and H.6.4 (Extensions and Alterations) of the adopted Unitary Development Plan as well as the Residential Extension Guidelines adopted 2003.
description: Erection of single storey rear and rear infill extension to the house.
